verbose_text: Similarly, shRNA silencing of arrestins has been shown to enhance ERK1/2 activation mediated by the alpha 2A -adrenergic receptor and the sphingosine 1-phosphate receptor [XREF_BIBR] and siRNA knockdown of both GRK and arrestin enhanced ERK1/2 activation by the M 3 -muscarinic acetylcholine receptor [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: arrestins has been shown to enhance ERK1/2
